imdb.plot outline: Phil is ill. Written by Rob Holloway and Phil Ellis, each episode is a short three minute mockumentary that focuses in on two main characters - Phil, who suffers from a strange syndrome, and his long suffering girlfriend, Helen. Phil's problem? His love of TV - especially man shows like Top Gear, QI and Ray Mears - has taken over his life.
imdb.title: Phil's Ill
plot: Phil is ill. Phil's problem? His love of TV - especially man shows like Top Gear, QI and Ray Mears - has taken over his life.::Anonymous
